title: Grand Theft Auto Vice City - Action Adventure 2002
description:
Grand Theft Auto Vice City 2002 - PC-GAME Version 1.1 Updated.
Having just made it back onto the streets of Liberty City after a long 
stretch in maximum security prison, Tommy Vercetti is sent to Vice City 
by his old boss, Sonny Forelli. They were understandably nervous about 
his reappearance in Liberty City, so a trip down south seemed like a good 
idea. But all does not go smoothly upon his arrival in the glamorous, 
hedonistic metropolis of Vice City. He's set up and is left with no money 
and no merchandise. Sonny wants his money back, but the biker gangs, Cuban 
gangsters, and corrupt politicians stand in his way. Most if not all of 
Vice City seems to want Tommy dead. His only answer is to fight back and 
take over the city himself.

Info.
=>-Developer......................: Rockstar North.
=>-Publisher......................: Rockstar Games.
=>-Platform.......................: Microsoft Windows.
=>-Release date...................: 27 October 2002.
=>-Genre..........................: Action-adventure Open World.
=>-Mode...........................: Single player.
=>-Media..........................: 2 X CD.

System Specifications.
=>-Minimum system requirements :..: Recommended system requirements.
=>-CPU 800 MHz :..................: CPU 1.2GHz CPU.
=>-Memory 128 MB RAM :............: Memory 256 MB RAM.
=>-GPU 32 MB DX3D Graphics :......: GPU 64 MB DX3D Graphics.
=>-Direct X 8.1 :.................: Direct X 8.1
=>-OS Win98/ME/2K/XP/wIN7/WIN10 :.: OS Win98/ME/2K/XP/wIN7/WIN10.
=>-HDD Space 915MB :..............: HDD Space 1.55GB.
=>-Sound DX 9 sound card :........: Sound DX 9 With Surround Sound.

Media Files.
=>-GTA_Vice_City_Install.iso.
=>-GTA_Vice_City_Play.iso.

Quick Install Instructions.
=>-Mount or insert GTA_Vice_City_Install.iso run setup.
=>-When asked mount or insert GTA_Vice_City_Play.iso and OK.
=>-Apply ViceCity_Patch_11.exe.
=>-Replace Games gta-vc.exe with one provided
